character.statement: Ah... fellow adventurers!
Mongo, no uniform in front of our guests?! Scat!
A race, you say? That reminds me of when I was a young adventurer.
I was a young man preparing to live my dreams.
Everyone wants to follow their dreams, but mine were different.
My father was always supportive, but even he couldn't keep up.
I went on my voyage to many distant islands, only to be foiled.
Until one day I came across a troop of monkeys.
At first I was afraid. One might say I was petrified.
But deep down inside I knew that this is where I belonged.
The fruit smoothies brought me back to an earlier time when I was younger...
But I digress. You want to re-enter the race?
No. I've never been able to get off this island.
Quit ringing the bell, I'm right here!
What is this, a tropical resort?
Awfully empty for a resort, is anyone here?
Let's ring that bell to get someone's attention.
We can't stay. We have to win the Flying Ace Race!
That Crusoe guy sure talks a lot. Let's see if he can help us get off this island.
Hey, what's that monkey holding?
This blimp is great! [Player Name], hop aboard.
Probably taking a nap somewhere.
No time to lose though, we need to get back in the race!
Yes, can you help us?
Wow, this is great! Can you really make this?
Where's Crusoe? You'd think he'd be here to send us off.
